channel.title: Success on mathias wellner
channel.description: Recent content in Success on mathias wellner

item.title: Conference MMVR
item.description: I am in! After sending an abstract to the conference Medicine Meets Virtual Reality about the Lokomat and virtual reality (obstacle crossing), I now received the message, that it was accepted for poster presentation. And so my name appears once more in the www, on the Abstract Guidelines page. It’s there, at the very, very end of this long list.
